articles.title: Henlo World
articles.description: Rstudio Addicted, Python Fansboy and Shiny Developer
articles.contents:
Henlo! My name is Fajar Nugroho, thanks for visiting my site. I
currently work as a Product Marketing Analyst at Rakamin Academy a Start
Up Education Technology based in Jakarta, Indonesia. I enjoy using R
& Python since I learn Data Science.  Previously, I completed my
Bachelor of Fisheries Science at Universitas Gadjah Mada in August
2018. I enjoy writing about things I‚Äôm working on and try to share some
interesting things I discover on my blog.
Feel free to get in touch if any of the posts catch your
interest!
Shiny Developer
Need a dashboard for your business?  I recommend develop it with
Shiny Apps, because I can develop it for you !
Thunnus
Catching Sales
